distanceModel.description: Specifies the distance model for the audio emitter: linear, inverse, exponential, custom).

minDistance.description: A reference distance for reducing volume as the emitter moves further from the listener.

maxDistance.description: The maximum distance between the emitter and listener, beyond which the audio cannot be heard.

rolloffFactor.description: Describes how quickly the volume is reduced as the emitter moves away from the listener. Also referred to as falloff factor.
